definitions.definition: Existing in or constructed from fantasy; of or relating to fantasy; fanciful.
definitions.example: He told fantastic stories of dragons and goblins.

definitions.definition: Not believable; implausible; seemingly only possible in fantasy.
definitions.example: She entered the lab and stood gaping for a good ten minutes at the fantastic machinery at work all around her.

definitions.definition: Resembling fantasies in irregularity, caprice, or eccentricity; irregular; grotesque.
Wonderful; marvelous; excellent; extraordinarily good or great (used especially as an intensifier).
definitions.example: "I had a simply fantastic vacation, and I can't wait to tell you all about it!"
